game.name: Waves of Chess
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 터치 전용 옵션, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A roguelike chess game where players see how far one set of pieces will take them. A short, run based game that respects the classic, but with a few fun twists. Compete against friends and the world on the leaderboards, how far will you go?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A roguelike chess game where players see how far one set of pieces will take them. A short, run based game that respects the classic, but with a few fun twists. Compete against friends and the world on the leaderboards, how far will you go?
